name: Salewa Alpenrose Ultra Mid Gore-Tex Light Hiking Boots - Women's
categories: Alpenrose Ultra Mid Gore-Tex Light Hiking Boo
description: Comfortable and grippy hiking shoes for mountain adventures where speed counts. The Alpenrose Ultra boots have an incredibly light upper, coated with a TPU overlay for protection, coupled with a sole that keeps you nimble and secure in varied terrain. The mid-height cut protects your ankles from trail debris and supports your feet when carrying heavier loads.Lightweight fabric upper has durable coating for weather- and abrasion-protection.GORE-TEX® Extended Comfort membrame keeps your feet dry.Salewa 3F System connects the instep with the sole and heel for a supportive, flexible fit.Removable OrthoLite footbed adds comfort underfoot.EVA midsole cushions and supports feet on uneven terrain.Michelin® Ultra Train outsole with Outdoor Compound rubber for a great balance of stickiness, traction and durability.
